name: Mop simulator 2002
description:
You are a janitor at sunny creeks theater.

 Your boss tells you to clean the whole theater in one day.

 Armed with only a mop.

 Will you get the whole place clean.

 Or be fired from lack of trying.

  • Action packed, turn-based, text-based game play.
  • A compelling story.
  • 4 commands that will make you smile and say "What am I doing."

Mop simulator 2002 is completely free. If you enjoy it please consider paying one cent for it. The money will help development of other games.
